level.heading: Report.
level.text: The Department shall report to the committee of the Council having jurisdiction over health and human services matters on or before January 1, 2005 and on or before July 1, 2005 on the assessment of fees on manufacturers and labelers of prescription drugs.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-164
level.text: For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.
